verbs.description: sf mcroskey mattress [V: sold] [ARG2: to fresno pleasant mattress san francisco mcroskey mattress] has been sold to pleasant mattress the fresno company said it will immediately begin handling mcroskey manufacturing distribution and marketing mcroskey was founded in 1899 and has continuously manufactured mattresses in the city since that time as we continue to grow pleasant in to a brand portfolio leader we were looking for a unique luxury offering like this that we could market to select high - quality retailers throughout the country pleasant mattress ceo rion morgenstern said in a statement pleasant mattress is renovating a 25 000 square foot space in its fresno campus to manufacture mcroskey products the company said hearst journalism fellow fresno mcroskey pleasant mattress mattress robin azevedo san francisco san rafael rion morgenstern sophia kunthara
